name: Mechanical Box
description: This Mechanical Box is a device created with only one purpose: to always protect what's inside, no matter what it takes. Every protection layer is a new, unique puzzle. Tester's task is to try and hack into it and override the security system of the Box by finding the secret switches, cracking the passwords and solving the mind-blowing puzzles. The player will have to use as much creative thinking, attention to detail as possible. Are you ready for this challenge? Make a decision!
